Package org.apache.logging.log4j

Interface ScopedContext.Instance

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractScopedContextProvider.Instance, AbstractScopedContextProvider.KeyValueInstance, AbstractScopedContextProvider.MapInstance
Enclosing class:
ScopedContext
public static interface ScopedContext.Instance
A holder of scoped context data.

    Method
    Description
    <R> R
    call(Callable<R> task)
    Executes a code block that includes all the key/value pairs added to the ScopedContext.

    Creates an Instance to declare the ThreadContext should be included.
    Runnable
    wrap(Runnable task)
    Wraps the provided Runnable method with a Runnable method that will instantiate the Scoped and Thread Contexts in the target Thread before the caller's run method is called.
    <R> Callable<R>
    wrap(Callable<R> task)
    Wraps the provided Callable method with a Callable method that will instantiate the Scoped and Thread Contexts in the target Thread before the caller's call method is called.

  • Method Details

    • where

      ScopedContext.Instance where(String key, Object value)
      Adds a key/value pair to the ScopedContext being constructed.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to add.
      value - the value associated with the key.
      Returns:
      the ScopedContext being constructed.

    • where

      ScopedContext.Instance where(String key, Supplier<Object> supplier)
      Adds a key/value pair to the ScopedContext being constructed.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to add.
      supplier - the function to generate the value.
      Returns:
      the ScopedContext being constructed.

    • withThreadContext

      ScopedContext.Instance withThreadContext()
      Creates an Instance to declare the ThreadContext should be included.
      Returns:
      the ScopedContext being constructed.

    • run

      void run(Runnable task)
      Executes a code block that includes all the key/value pairs added to the ScopedContext.
      Parameters:
      task - the code block to execute.

    • run

      Future<Void> run(ExecutorService executorService, Runnable task)
      Executes a code block that includes all the key/value pairs added to the ScopedContext on a different Thread.
      Parameters:
      executorService - The ExecutorService to use.
      task - the code block to execute.
      Returns:
      a Future representing pending completion of the task

    • wrap

      Runnable wrap(Runnable task)
      Wraps the provided Runnable method with a Runnable method that will instantiate the Scoped and Thread Contexts in the target Thread before the caller's run method is called.
      Parameters:
      task - the Runnable task to perform.
      Returns:
      a Runnable.

    • wrap

      <R> Callable<R> wrap(Callable<R> task)
      Wraps the provided Callable method with a Callable method that will instantiate the Scoped and Thread Contexts in the target Thread before the caller's call method is called.
      Parameters:
      task - the Callable task to perform.
      Returns:
      a Callable.
